page.title: 08Recreation in Chorley (2)
page.content: Chorley has now got one cinema complex which is situated on Bolton Street and incorporates three cinemas.The films are generally changed on a Thursday. The other building in Chorley which was previously used as a cinema and is situated on the junction of Union Street and Market Street is now used exclusively for Bingo. Chorley Little Theatre which puts on a variety of amatuer productions throughout the year is situated on Dole Lane.Some of the local churches also have their own amatuer dramatic socities. There are two libraries in Chorley. A small branch library on Eaves Lane and the main library for the area on Avondale Road. The main library is scheduled to move to the old Chorley college buildings on Union Street
